description:
Roger has soft milky white skin, which belies his occupation, which is a car mechanic.
You can tell by his hands and fingernails, the he is up to elbows in greasy engines daily.
He has a softness to him, that made me think maybe he was playing for our team, but you hear his voice, and his interests, and you think, maybe not.
His video choice was blonds with big asses, and it kept him charged up pretty good.
After finishing the video, he did indicate he would be down for oral and even doing more, so I might have to put him with one of another twink-like guy for a little twink-fest!
title: Roger - Solo
